messages.subject: Ideas of God!  Book suggestion.
messages.msgSnippet: Have any of you read the book The Game of God? It has a real interesting take on a God who is involved in our world as an underlying creative force. I
messages.messageBody:
Have any of you read the book The Game of God?
It has a real interesting take on a "God" who is involved in our
world as an underlying creative force.
I recommend it for those who like to question as I do.
And I can't help but add...would you punish your grandkids for
something that your kids did (re reference to childbirth pain
death/etc for the Garden of Eden sin). Not the kind of behavior I
want to emulate. What about you?
Beth
